## NFTDrop.getRoyalty() method

Get the royalty basis points for this collection

**Signature:**

```typescript
getRoyalty(): Promise<number>;
```

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;number&gt;

royalty basis points

## Example

```jsx
const royalty = await program.getRoyalty();
console.log(royalty);
```
